product_name: ExuvianceHydraSoothe Refresh Toner with Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingExuviance HydraSoothe Refresh Toner with Hyaluronic Acid is a gentle face toner for Dry/Sensitive skin with Polyhydroxy Acid, Hyaluronic Acid and Cucumber Extract.
details: DetailsBenefitsLet your skin and mind relax with our gentle antiaging skincare. A gentle, alcohol-free toning solution designed for delicate, sensitive skin to provide a hydrating and freshening boost.Contains the Polyhydroxy Acid (PHA) Gluconolactone, Hyaluronic Acid and an infusion of Botanicals including Aloe, Cucumber and Chamomile to target skin's ideal hydration and pH balance. Dermatologist and Allergy tested.Research ResultsPercentage of respondents noting improvement after 2 weeks of twice daily use:100% skin feels supple, looks less dull97% brighter, more luminous skin97% smoother skin texture and less noticeable poresKey IngredientsPHAHyaluronic AcidCucumber Fruit ExtractItem 2554740How To UseMoisten cotton ball or tissue. Gently smooth over a cleansed face in the morning and evening. Follow with an Exuviance serum or moisturizer.Precautions: For external use only. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If rash or irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical assistance.IngredientsAqua/water/eau, Butylene Glycol, Octoxynol-12, Gluconolactone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Algae Extract, Cucumis Sativus (cucumber) Fruit Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (rosemary) Leaf Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (matricaria) Flower Extract, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Propylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Arginine,disodium EDTA, Ammonium Hydroxide, Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin,parfum (fragrance), Yellow 5(CI 19140), Red 4 (CI 14700).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Moisten cotton ball or tissue. Gently smooth over a cleansed face in the morning and evening. Follow with an Exuviance serum or moisturizer.Precautions: For external use only. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse well with water. If rash or irritation develops, discontinue use. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, seek medical assistance.

reviews.headline: Works on my Super Sensitive Skin!
reviews.comments: I have the MOST sensitive skin ever. Generally, I can only keep a 2-step skincare routine, as anything more breaks me out. In the morning, I rinse my face, neck and chest with water, pat dry, and apply an SPF that is also a great moisturizer. At night, I wash my face with Simple brand and apply La Roche Posay double repair moisturizer. However, after a round of probiotics caused an insane amount of greasy, painful breakouts on my face and down my neck, I needed to do something extra to help heal my skin. After research, I found that PHAs are safe for sensitive skin and helps with cell turnover to clear up the skin. I bought this toner specifically because it has PHAs. The hyaluronic acid is a nice bonus. I use this every night after I wash my face, BUT I dampen my face, neck, and chest before applying. This helps to reintroduce moisture in my skin and dilute the toner to make it easier for my skin to handle. I have noticed a huge improvement in the acne scars on my neck from the probiotic breakout, AND I am having very few breakouts on my face now! It took about 2 weeks to start making improvements, but my skin is looking better than it has in a long time. I'm optimistic that it will help me return my skin health to a balanced state.

reviews.headline: Good toner for normal skin
reviews.comments: I was looking for a toner for the first time, and I have normal skin, sometimes dry and/or oily. At first this made my face a little red but after a few uses it had a soothing feeling and made my face feel cool without any burning. May buy again but may look for something different, definitely okay! Also I like the smell lol

reviews.headline: It's a good product!
reviews.comments: I was recommended this product by an Ulta employee after I explanied that I've had a lot of flaky, dry skin on and around my mouth and nose. So far, this product has made my skin feel rejuvinated and hydrated from the usual dryness I experience. I haven't used a toner in a few years, so I'm hoping this will help exfoliate the dead skin off my face like the employee said it would. I just got the product yesterday and have only used it once, which is the reason I only gave it 4 stars. I will write another review in a couple weeks to see if its held up and I'll paste this review to the top of the new review.

reviews.headline: This stuff!
reviews.comments: I used it yesterday for the first time after washing with the Gentle Cleansing Face Wash for sensitive skin. Almost immediately my face felt amazing! The redness I get on my cheeks went away and my skin looked so good.

reviews.headline: I really wanted to love this
reviews.comments: This burns so bad. It smells great but it dried out my skin, my skin is now flakey. Definitely not for sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: Great for flaky skin!
reviews.comments: The Rep suggested I stop using harsh acne cleanser and try their gentle cleanser and this toner. My nose was red and flaky and this is a good toner to use after cleansing. It is good for over treated oily skin. I'm on my third bottle!

reviews.headline: I like this Toner!!!
reviews.comments: It takes off leftover makeup and my face feels fresh after using it. It doesn't sting my face like the witch hazel and acne products I used. This is good for my combo skin and flakiness.

reviews.headline: sensitive skin beware
reviews.comments:
this product specifically states good for sensitive skin. Unfortunately this did not mean my sensitive skin. Immediately after putting on, my face started to burn and turned red like a very bad sunburn. it dried and fried my skin. 

I have dry and sensitive skin brought on by perimenopause. I have fair skin and burn easily.

reviews.headline: There's Better Toners on the Market
reviews.comments: I don't think this is very "soothing," since the acids in it gave my sensitive skin more of a "cooling" and slightly stinging reaction. It also has a rather strong scent reminding me a little of a Pina Colada. It's not the worst toner, but definitely not soothing in my opinion. I will not be buying again.

reviews.headline: A must for cystic acne!!!!!
reviews.comments: I changed from the birth control pill to an IUD about a year prior to using this product... with this change, I began to struggle with cystic acne for the first time in my life. They popped up on my chin at a minimum of two times per month. And they hurt so bad! An esthetician recommended using this product, so I gave it a try. I had used everything from other high-end skincare acne lines to home remedies. I actually had a cystic acne spot on my chin the day I bought this product, so I decided to use it that night. Woke up the next morning and the spot was gone! I have been using for 2 weeks (I use this every other night & just on my "acne" areas) and have yet to have another cystic acne spot or any breakout since that date. I am in awe & so thankful!!!!

reviews.headline: Disappointing
reviews.comments: Was supposed to hydrate, it dried out my skin. It had added unnecessary colorant. My skin looked worse after using it. This will be going back.

reviews.headline: A favorite
reviews.comments: This is a great winter toner for combo sensitive skin! Toners always make me react in some way but this is just pure refreshing. Will be repurchasing soon.

reviews.headline: Great toner for sensitive skin
reviews.comments: This is a great toner!! Works well to help maintain oil without stripping the skin. This is a good every day toner. It's worth the money. Awesome for sensitive skin!!

reviews.headline: Helped my oily skin!
reviews.comments: I tried this on a whim, after deciding to add a toner to my routine. I made sure the ingredients weren't going to give me too much trouble. While my skin did have a slight reaction when I first started using it, I wasn't surprised since I always have a reaction when I try something new. I am almost on my second bottle, I love how my skin feels throughout the day. It absorbs nicely. I have noticed my extremely oily skin is under control after using this for about a week in the AM and PM. By the end of the day my entire face would look wet from my oil production, before I added this toner. Now my cheeks have become normal and my nose and forehead still get a slight shine, but nothing I'm mad about. I actually like the slight shine. Very happy I went with this toner!

reviews.headline: Feels great,
reviews.comments: I have been using Clinique for years, I really like the way this product works and feels on my skin.

reviews.headline: Good quality toner
reviews.comments: Smells great, but doesn't smell too strong. The texture is nice when it goes on and drys/absorbs very well. My skin feels great after using it. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: I'd buy again
reviews.comments: Great product. Not drying at all.

reviews.headline: My fav!
reviews.comments: This is my favorite toner. I'm super sensitive & it doesnt break me out & actually hydrates my skin. Love it!!

reviews.headline: I love this toner!
reviews.comments: An Ulta clerk, Bret, recommended this several years ago. He was so insistent that he made a sample for me to take home.I have been using it ever since. My skin is clearer, my rosacea is better, my pores are smaller.I don't know how I ever got along without it. Thank you, Bret!

reviews.headline: Holy Grail of toners!!
reviews.comments: I bought this toner after it was recommended to me by a sales associate in Ulta. She has eczema just as I do and said I must try it! I've been using it for 3 months now and it has changed my life!! It's so refreshing, and gentle on my sensitive skin. Anyone with eczema knows how important it is to be careful what you put on your face. I'm never going back!! I recommend anyone with dry sensitive skin to use this toner! 10/10!! ❤️❤️❤️

faceoff_positive.comments: I absolutely love this product! I was in Ulta looking for a toner years ago, as I was new to toners at the time, and wanted to add one to my skincare regime. The Ulta SA recommended me this one and I have been using it ever since. I have tried other toners here and there over the years, but I always find myself coming back to this one.  It is gentle, yet effective. It removes any leftover residue, surface oils that I wake up with, without drying the skin out. It has no overpowering scent and leaves my skin feeling fresh and hydrated. Plus it is Alcohol-free!
faceoff_positive.headline: Holy Grail for Years!

faceoff_negative.comments: Received this toner as a part of a promotional package if I purchased another product. It's gentle and does not irritate my sensitive skin. I have been using it daily with the other products. I may or may not purchase this item on its own in the future.
faceoff_negative.headline: Gentle toner

rollup.name: HydraSoothe Refresh Toner with Hyaluronic Acid
